messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SSShout out to all my liggasss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: ALL CRIMINALSSS WILL BE MADE INTO MEET AT THE KITCHEN COMPLEMENT YOUR CHEF!!!!!!!!!!!!!!1

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whoever bringsss me the Jack Gray'sss head getsss all accesss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to bad luck, not more than 15 rodents have stampeded into the maintenance areas.

messages.body:
